mapper.select: select /* COAAdmMapper.getAdmListCnt */ count(*) from co_adm_mst a

choose.when: and (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='ADMIN_DEPT_CD' and cd=a.dept_cd) like concat('%', #{q}, '%')
choose.otherwise: and ( id like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or name like concat('%', #{q}, '%') or (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='ADMIN_DEPT_CD' and cd=a.dept_cd) like concat('%', #{q}, '%') )

mapper.select: select /* COAAdmMapper.selectAdmDtl */ adm_seq , id , auth_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='ADMIN_AUTH_CD' and cd=a.auth_cd) as auth_cd_nm , dept_cd , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='ADMIN_DEPT_CD' and cd=a.dept_cd) as dept_cd_nm , (select cd_nm from co_code_mst where cd_id='ADMIN_DEPT_CD' and cd=a.dept_cd) as dept_nm , type_cd , name , email , allw_ip , lgn_crtfn_yn , use_yn from co_adm_mst a where adm_seq = #{detailsKey}

select /* COAAdmMapper.getadmmenuinf */ group_concat(menu_seq order by (select lft_val from co_menu_mst where menu_seq = a.menu_seq) separator ',') as menu_seq from co_adm_menu_dtl a where adm_seq = #{detailsKey}
mapper.delete: delete /* COAAdmMapper.deleteAdmModMst */ from co_adm_mod_mst where mod_seq = #{modSeq}
delete /* COAAdmMapper.deleteAdmModDtl */ from co_adm_mod_dtl where mod_seq = #{modSeq}
mapper.select: select /* COAAdmMapper.getIdOverlapCheck */ count(*) from co_adm_mst where id = #{id}
select /* COAAdmMapper.getEmailOverlapCheck */ count(*) from co_adm_mst where email = #{email}
select /* COAAdmMapper.getAdmSessionId */ lgn_ssn_id from co_adm_mst where id = #{sessionId}
select /* COAAdmMapper.getPwdCheck */ count(*) from co_adm_pwd_dtl where adm_seq = #{admSeq} and pwd in (#{pwd})
select /* COAAdmMapper.selectPwdList */ pwd_seq from co_adm_pwd_dtl where adm_seq = #{admSeq}
mapper.delete: select /* COAAdmMapper.deletePwd */ pwd_seq from co_adm_pwd_dtl where adm_seq = #{admSeq} and pwd_seq = #{pwdSeq}
mapper.select: select /* COSampleMapper.getEthicList */ seq , reg_id from contactus_mngr a where reg_return = 'procYes' and ifnull(reg_id, '') != ''

SELECT /* getAuthLogList */ ADM_SEQ , BFRE_AUTH_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'ADMIN_AUTH_CD' AND CD = A.BFRE_AUTH_CD) AS BFRE_AUTH_CD_NM , MOD_AUTH_CD , (SELECT CD_NM FROM CO_CODE_MST WHERE CD_ID = 'ADMIN_AUTH_CD' AND CD = A.MOD_AUTH_CD) AS MOD_AUTH_CD_NM , REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME , REG_DTM FROM CO_ADM_AUTH_LOG A WHERE ADM_SEQ = #{detailsKey} ORDER BY REG_DTM DESC
